**merchantId** | **String** | (Conditional) Identifier of the DPA generated by VISA based on the previously provided during the Merchant Registration Process when known. | [optional] 
**merchantName** | **String** | Merchant name. Required for the Network's system to facilitate authentication. | 
**categoryCode** | **String** | (Conditional) Code associated with Merchant Category. Describes the merchant's type of business, product or service. If it is checked, it has to be valid value. Ex, \"5311\" | [optional]
